Html:
Hi

I'm new to PRISM and I'm having some problems getting from theory to practice. Are there any good tutorials (step by step) for PRISM+RIA out there?


Re

Dennis

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg406140.aspx

http://sagittariustechlabs.blogspot.com/2010/10/using-prism-wcf-ria-services-and-mvvm.html

http://johnpapa.net/mvvm-and-prism-demo-for-pdc09-silverlight-session

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dphill/archive/2009/08/17/prism-and-net-ria-services.aspx

http://www.prismforsilverlight.com/2010/12/24/creating-a-reusable-wcf-ria-dal-layer/  wcf ria library

http://mtaulty.com/CommunityServer/blogs/mike_taultys_blog/archive/2009/10/27/prism-and-silverlight-screencasts-on-channel-9.aspx

http://blogs.msdn.com/b/kashiffl/archive/2010/10/05/integrating-prism-v4-region-navigation-with-silverlight-frame-navigation.aspx

These should give you some ideas. I have just started learning prism myself. If you are planning to use prism you need to use prism you need

to use wcf ria libraries. Mike taulty's video on dependency injection shows how to use a modular library as well. John papa video was interesting
